Package civitas.celestis.math.atomic

Class AtomicQuaternion

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<Quaternion>
civitas.celestis.math.atomic.AtomicQuaternion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AtomicQuaternion extends AtomicReference<Quaternion>
An atomic Quaternion.

    • invert

      public void invert() throws ArithmeticException
      Sets the value of this reference to the inverse of the current value.
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - When the Euclidean norm of this quaternion is zero

    • normalize

      public void normalize() throws ArithmeticException
      Normalizes this quaternion to have a magnitude of 1.
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - When the magnitude of this quaternion is zero

    • normalizeOrZero

      public void normalizeOrZero()
      Normalizes this quaternion to have a magnitude of 1, but will set the value to zero if the magnitude is zero.
